  <div id="container">
    <div class="docs markdown"><div class="pilwrap" id="typescript">
  <h1>
    <a href="#typescript" name="typescript" class="pilcrow"></a>
TypeScript
  </h1>
</div>
<p><a href="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/actions/workflows/ci.yml"><img src="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg" alt="CI"></a>
<a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript"><img src="https://badge.fury.io/js/typescript.svg" alt="npm version"></a>
<a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript"><img src="https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/typescript.svg" alt="Downloads"></a>
<a href="https://securityscorecards.dev/viewer/?uri=github.com/microsoft/TypeScript"><img src="https://api.securityscorecards.dev/projects/github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/badge" alt="OpenSSF Scorecard"></a></p>
<p><a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/">TypeScript</a> is a language for application-scale JavaScript. TypeScript adds optional types to JavaScript that support tools for large-scale JavaScript applications for any browser, for any host, on any OS. TypeScript compiles to readable, standards-based JavaScript. Try it out at the <a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/play/">playground</a>, and stay up to date via <a href="https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/typescript">our blog</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/typescript">Twitter account</a>.</p>
<p>Find others who are using TypeScript at <a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/community/">our community page</a>.</p>
<div class="pilwrap" id="installing">
  <h2>
    <a href="#installing" name="installing" class="pilcrow"></a>
Installing
  </h2>
</div>
<p>For the latest stable version:</p>
<pre><code class="bash">npm install -D typescript
</code></pre>
<p>For our nightly builds:</p>
<pre><code class="bash">npm install -D typescript@next
</code></pre>
<div class="pilwrap" id="contribute">
  <h2>
    <a href="#contribute" name="contribute" class="pilcrow"></a>
Contribute
  </h2>
</div>
<p>There are many ways to <a href="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md">contribute</a> to TypeScript.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues">Submit bugs</a> and help us verify fixes as they are checked in.</li>
<li>Review the <a href="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/pulls">source code changes</a>.</li>
<li>Engage with other TypeScript users and developers on <a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/typescript">StackOverflow</a>.</li>
<li>Help each other in the <a href="https://discord.gg/typescript">TypeScript Community Discord</a>.</li>
<li>Join the <a href="https://twitter.com/search?q=%23TypeScript">#typescript</a> discussion on Twitter.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md">Contribute bug fixes</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>This project has adopted the <a href="https://opensource.microsoft.com/codeofconduct/">Microsoft Open Source Code of Conduct</a>. For more information see
the <a href="https://opensource.microsoft.com/codeofconduct/faq/">Code of Conduct FAQ</a> or contact <a href="mailto:opencode@microsoft.com.html">opencode@microsoft.com</a>
with any additional questions or comments.</p>
<div class="pilwrap" id="documentation">
  <h2>
    <a href="#documentation" name="documentation" class="pilcrow"></a>
Documentation
  </h2>
</div>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/typescript-in-5-minutes.html">TypeScript in 5 minutes</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/intro.html">Programming handbook</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.typescriptlang.org/">Homepage</a></li>
</ul>
<div class="pilwrap" id="roadmap">
  <h2>
    <a href="#roadmap" name="roadmap" class="pilcrow"></a>
Roadmap
  </h2>
</div>
<p>For details on our planned features and future direction, please refer to our <a href="https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Roadmap">roadmap</a>.</p>
</div>
